Translations.Text: Ina rantsuwa da Attinu da Azzaitun
Lalle ne, Mun halitta mutum a cikin mafi kyawon tsayuwa
Sa'an nan, Muka mayar da shi mafi ƙasƙantar masu rauni
Face waɗanda suka yi imani, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, saboda haka suna da sakamako wanda ba ya yankewa
To, bayan haka me ya sanya ka ka ƙaryata sakamako (wanda za a yi a bayan Tashin ¡iyama)
Ashe Allah ba Shi ne Mafi masu hukunci kyawon hukunci ba
